subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Things to Do.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: Calanques National Park.   The South of France is renowned for its beautiful coastline along the Mediterranean Sea. Here  are some activities to enjoy by the sea:   •  Nice: Visit the sandy shores and enjoy the vibrant Promenade des Anglais.   •  Antibes: Relax on the pebbled beaches and explore the charming old town.   •  Saint-Tropez: Experience the exclusive beach clubs and glamorous atmosphere.   •
